statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE location = 'Office' AND threat_level > 5;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE threat_level > 5 AND location = 'Restricted Area';
DELETE FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_time < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 100 AND success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access' AND event_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM threats WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing' AND threat_level > 3;
DELETE FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5 AND user_id = 20;
